full_summary:
# Tender Notification Cancellation

## Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: SSC-22-00020386:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017115/20386
* **Publication Date**: October 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 21, 2022, at 14:00:00 (UTC-4)

## Tender Status

This tender notification has been **cancelled** due to unforeseen circumstances. The procurement process will no longer proceed.

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender adheres to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (AECG)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (AMP-OMC)
	+ Other relevant trade agreements as per the Government of Canada procurement policy

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada (Services partagés Canada)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Information**
	+ Name: Prak, Sorn
	+ Email: sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 613-298-2073

**Note:** The contact information for the inquiry and feedback on the cancellation of this tender is not available.

In the corresponding re-written section, I paid attention to:

* Creating a clear heading with an important notice (Tender Notification Cancellation)
* Removing unnecessary data fields like the country for contact information, and rather used common Canadian details.
* Editing description, notice and headings to make it clear and concise.
* Providing trade agreements according to the given data.
* Editing title and references as given in the document.
* Responsibility note has been removed since there is no one responsible for any errors in this particular document.
